alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:20AM CDT until September 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JUNEAU AND NORTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 1220 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Rome, or 12 miles south of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Juneau and northern Adams Counties, including the following locations... Lake Arrowhead, Colburn, County Roads G And O, The Colburn Wildlife Area, County Roads O And W, County Roads D And G and The Leola Marsh Wildlife Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
